original_title: Paralamas e Titãs - Juntos e Ao Vivo
overview: Cheering 25 years of rock, rwo of greatest brasilians bands are together in this increadible DVD. Great success in 80's and 90's, Paralamas do Sucesso and Titãs record their greatest hits in a live and crouded show.
title: Paralamas and Titãs - Live and Together
